title: Bank of Korea trims interest rates after holding for almost two years
content: The BOK cut its benchmark interest rate from 3.5% to 3.25% after a “clear trend of stabilization” with inflation.
summary: The BOK cut its benchmark interest rate from 3.5% to 3.25% after a “clear trend of stabilization” with inflation.

title: AMD launches AI chip to rival Nvidia's Blackwell
content: Advanced generative AI such as OpenAI's ChatGPT requires massive data centers full of GPUs, which has created demand for more companies to provide AI chips.
summary: Advanced generative AI such as OpenAI's ChatGPT requires massive data centers full of GPUs, which has created demand for more companies to provide AI chips.

title: The Fed is finally cutting rates, but banks aren't in the clear just yet
content: When the Federal Reserve cut its benchmark rate by half a percentage point last month, it boosted prospects for many banks.
summary: When the Federal Reserve cut its benchmark rate by half a percentage point last month, it boosted prospects for many banks.

title: CNBC Daily Open: CPI’s higher than expected. Is it just a 'janky' data point?
content: It’s important to see whether individual data points cohere into a larger pattern, or if they’re just “janky,” as Atlanta Fed President Raphael Bostic put it.
summary: It’s important to see whether individual data points cohere into a larger pattern, or if they’re just “janky,” as Atlanta Fed President Raphael Bostic put it.

title: Grab CEO Anthony Tan gives his no. 1 piece of advice for aspiring entrepreneurs
content: He is the head honcho of one of Southeast Asia's biggest tech companies, Grab — but he'll be the first to say that the journey has not been easy.
summary: He is the head honcho of one of Southeast Asia's biggest tech companies, Grab — but he'll be the first to say that the journey has not been easy.

title: Berkshire slashes Bank of America stake to under 10%, no longer required to disclose frequently
content: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway cut its stake in Bank of America below an important level.
summary: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway cut its stake in Bank of America below an important level.

title: CNBC's Inside India newsletter: Is China's stock market rally behind Indian equity losses?
content: China's CSI 300 index has gained about 25% since the stimulus measures were announced, while India's Nifty 50 has fallen by more than 3.5%. Will that continue?
summary: China's CSI 300 index has gained about 25% since the stimulus measures were announced, while India's Nifty 50 has fallen by more than 3.5%. Will that continue?

title: Tributes pour in for Ratan Tata from industry titans and politicians
content: Tata is credited with taking his business house global via several high-profile acquisitions including that of Jaguar-Land Rover in 2008.
summary: Tata is credited with taking his business house global via several high-profile acquisitions including that of Jaguar-Land Rover in 2008.

title: Tesla robotaxi event comes after a decade of unfulfilled promises from Elon Musk

title: TD Bank pleads guilty in money laundering case, will pay $3 billion in penalties
content: The Department of Justice reportedly was investigating how drug traffickers used TD Bank to launder money derived from fentanyl sales in the U.S.
summary: The Department of Justice reportedly was investigating how drug traffickers used TD Bank to launder money derived from fentanyl sales in the U.S.

title: Zuckerberg's metaverse is finally showing signs of life, but it's not from VR
content: The company formerly known as Facebook appears to have found its footing in virtual and augmented reality through a different medium.
summary: The company formerly known as Facebook appears to have found its footing in virtual and augmented reality through a different medium.

title: From day-one parental leave to zero-hours reform, UK workers to gain raft of rights in flagship Labour bill
content: Workers will be allowed to take bereavement leave from day one, while pregnant women and new mothers will gain stronger protections against dismissal.
summary: Workers will be allowed to take bereavement leave from day one, while pregnant women and new mothers will gain stronger protections against dismissal.

title: 7-Eleven's parent company cuts full-year earnings forecast, presses ahead with restructuring
content: The news comes as the Japanese retail group resists a takeover attempt by Canada's Alimentation Couche-Tard.
summary: The news comes as the Japanese retail group resists a takeover attempt by Canada's Alimentation Couche-Tard.

title: Airbus monthly deliveries fall, piling pressure on annual target as production woes persist
content: "Reaching year end delivery guidance will be challenging, but not impossible," analysts at Deutsche Bank said.
summary: "Reaching year end delivery guidance will be challenging, but not impossible," analysts at Deutsche Bank said.

title: Inflation rate hit 2.4% in September, topping expectations; jobless claims highest since August 2023
content: The consumer price index was expected to show a 0.1% increase in September and a 2.3% gain from a year ago, according to Dow Jones consensus estimates.
summary: The consumer price index was expected to show a 0.1% increase in September and a 2.3% gain from a year ago, according to Dow Jones consensus estimates.

title: Microsoft announces new AI tools to help ease workload for doctors and nurses
content: Microsoft announced a series of new health-care data and AI tools for clinicians on Thursday.

title: Wealthy millennials and Gen Z are redefining philanthropy
content: Wealthy donors under the age of 43 are more likely to volunteer, fundraise and act as mentors for charitable causes rather than just give money.
summary: Wealthy donors under the age of 43 are more likely to volunteer, fundraise and act as mentors for charitable causes rather than just give money.

title: Why the U.S. government is investigating Google
content: A series of complaints say Google's dominant behavior in the online search, advertising, and web applications markets is violating antitrust laws.
summary: A series of complaints say Google's dominant behavior in the online search, advertising, and web applications markets is violating antitrust laws.

title: Left and right prey on weak French government as it prepares 'austerity' budget
content: France's new and already beleaguered government is to present its 2025 budget Thursday amid an ongoing fiscal crisis for the euro zone's second-largest economy.
summary: France's new and already beleaguered government is to present its 2025 budget Thursday amid an ongoing fiscal crisis for the euro zone's second-largest economy.

title: Ripple launches crypto storage services for banks in bid to diversify
content: Ripple said it is launching a slew of features aimed at helping banks and fintechs store digital tokens — as part of a broader push into crypto custody.
summary: Ripple said it is launching a slew of features aimed at helping banks and fintechs store digital tokens — as part of a broader push into crypto custody.

title: Delta sales guidance disappoints, CEO says airline expects lower demand around the election
content: Delta Air Lines expects to grow earnings in the fourth quarter, thanks to resilient travel demand and strong bookings for year-end holidays.
summary: Delta Air Lines expects to grow earnings in the fourth quarter, thanks to resilient travel demand and strong bookings for year-end holidays.

title: Pfizer threatened to sue renegade executives prior to activist schism, Starboard's Smith says
content: Starboard's Jeff Smith called on the company to assemble a special committee to investigate the matter, describing it as "flagrantly unethical."

content: United is expanding its summer 2025 travel schedule with off-the-beaten track destinations.

title: Fed officials were divided on whether to cut rates by half a point in September, minutes show
content: The Federal Reserve on Wednesday releases minutes from its Sept. 17-18 policy meeting.

title: Warren Buffett's S&P 500 bet paid off. Experts weigh in on whether it's still a winning strategy
content: Investing in an S&P 500 index fund can let you take a set-it-and-forget-it approach. But some experts say you could be missing an opportunity to diversify.

title: China's Golden Week holiday signals persistent consumer caution
content: China's Golden Week holiday affirmed a trend in more cautious spending, while consumers put greater emphasis on experiences.

title: OpenAI says bad actors are using its platform to disrupt elections, but with little 'viral engagement'

title: Hurricane Milton makes landfall in Florida as Category 3 storm
content: The NHC said the storm had sustained winds of up to 120 mph as it warned of a life-threatening storm surge, extreme winds and flash flooding.
summary: The NHC said the storm had sustained winds of up to 120 mph as it warned of a life-threatening storm surge, extreme winds and flash flooding.

title: ‘She doesn't stop talking’: How extroverts unknowingly irritate fellow travelers
content: Hours of chatting. Jam-packed vacation days. The same activities that extroverts thrive on can overwhelm their introverted travel companions.
summary: Hours of chatting. Jam-packed vacation days. The same activities that extroverts thrive on can overwhelm their introverted travel companions.
